summary: I WAS DRIVING SOUTH ON US HWY 43 AT 63 MPH AND MY POWER STEERING WENT OUT RESULTING IN MY TRUCK LEAVING THE ROAD AND CRASHING INTO THE TREES ON THE NORTHBOUND RIGHT OF WAY I KNOW THAT THE PREVIOUS YEAR TRUCKS HAVE A RECALL ON THE ELECTRONIC STEERING SYSTEM BUT THERE ARE NO RECALLS ON MY TRUCK AS OF YET ON THE POWER ASSISTED STEERING I WAS LUCKY PLEASE HELP KEEP ANYONE ELSE FROM GETTING HURT FROM THIS FAULTY SYSTEM
